column3: $1. Place all of the diced vegetables in a large bowl. Add the tomato juice
column6: and Tabasco. Season with salt and pepper and toss. $2. Transfer half of the mixture to a blender or food processor and pulse the machine on and off to coarsely puree the contents. $3. Return the pureed mixture to the bowl and stir to combine. $4. Refrigerate for 4 to 6 hours before serving.
